sub_title: Geologist | Business Manager | Technology & Solutions Development
summary:
Gustavo is a Brazilian geologist who obtained his masters degree in International Business at Hult International Business School, in Shanghai, China. He worked in exploration and mining projects in Brazil, until he transferred to a mining operation in Chile, where he was responsible for research and production of ore exported to China. Gustavo then specialized his career in international business and moved to China, where he worked as a data scientist and was involved in development of IoT applications for ore supply chain management and optimization. Gustavo is currently based in Amsterdam working as a Product Manager for a company that develops technology and solutions for the Mining and Natural Resources industries.

"Count on me because I have a firm commitment to accomplishments."

projects.title: Nova Brasilândia do Oeste Project - Base Metals + Gold
projects.description:
Successful project with a major lead and zinc discovery in the Amazon Forest (Brazil) after more than 3000m of diamond drilling and several exploration campaings focused on geochemistry and geophysics analysis.
Through appraising the discovery and evaluating the prospectus, our team played a major role in adding more value to the project.

projects.title: Characterization of mineral resources associated with granitic magmatism in the north-northeast region of Goiás, Brazil
projects.description:
Successful project which resulted in the discovery of new uranium occurrences and in a detailed petrography and geochemistry of known occurrences at Brazilian central region.
-Reported radiometric values over 15000 cps related to secondary uranium minerals - uranyl phosphate minerals- in Paleoproterozoic schists.
-The uranium concentration found in these areas indicates a great potential for new uranium deposits.

Target and Geochemistry -  Geosoft extentions for ArcGIS

profile_positions.description:
Managed a complete Business Line and products life cycle, from gathering market information to prioritizing customer requirements and launching solutions aligned with industry 4.0 trends.

•Digitalization accelerator: Applied Agile methodology to manage the creation and launch of an IoT platform connecting water monitoring devices, drill rigs, geotechnical sensors and CPT equipment, providing real-time insights, automated reports and operational recommendations.
•Value proposition design: Defined application of industry 4.0 in various product lines, creating new business models and revenue streams based on SaaS and DaaS in combination with hardware update.
•Strategic partnerships: Supported board of directors in developing business partnerships with private institutions and governmental agencies through market research, face-to-face meetings and synergies analysis, securing over 700,000 EUR in funding for R&D projects focused on tailing dam dewatering and management.
•Organizational enabler: Promoted different product lines to 20 sales executives through sales training sessions, workshops and webinars.
•Client relationship: Organized product demos and introductions on site to over 50 customers, developing connections with key clients in Europe, South America and Asia.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Client Ownership: Managed and advised over 30 global clients with solutions anchored by data analysis, clear objectives and market context, setting up tailor made action plans and creating solid and long-term relationships.
•       Effective communication: Presented key findings of industries developments and market observations during webinars, annual conferences, one-on-one meetings and roundtables in various Asian and European countries.
•       Business development: Supported the creation of proposals and presentations for potential clients, nurturing new projects and incrementing annual business revenues.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Assessed Oil & Gas, Metals & Mining and Renewables industries, focusing on human capital management practices, growth strategies and economic trends.

 •	Data Mining: Designed input sheets and validated Excel databases with over 150.000 rows and 50 columns, securing high quality data for further benchmark and interpretation.
 •	Data Analytics: Compiled and analyzed human capital, pay- and productivity private information on more than 700,000 staff in over 60 countries, creating customized Global and Country reports for Fortune 500s clients.
•	Data Visualization: Developed dashboards and data visualization formats on Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint, allowing clear data communication and highlighting the most relevant conclusions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Supported the global Integrated Business Planning Team and bridged the gap between Operations and Commercial Units by providing executives with analytics decision-support tools and translating technical complex data into actionable insights. 

• Supply & Demand modeling: Designed analytical tools, projected inventory figures and monitored operational indicators such as ore throughput and stockyard volumes, enabling 16Mt of iron ore to be produced and delivered to steel mills within a year.
• Sales & Operations cross-functionality (S&OP): Built collaborative relationship between teams and aligned sales forecasts with production capabilities, planning accurate long-term production prognoses and ensuring a stable Brazil-China supply chain.
 • Stakeholder management: Managed and interacted with onsite contractors in 5 different geographical locations simultaneously, ensuring high level of data acquisition and standardization among operations. 
• Continuous process improvement: Researched technologies in the IoT universe and promoted improvement of operational efficiency (and commercial profitability) through development of a business model focused on supply chain optimization supported by industry 4.0 and real-time data acquisition.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analyst: Integrated Planning and Quality Assurance

profile_positions.description:
Developed a business strategy focusing on supply chain optimization supported by industry 4.0 in order to leverage Honeywell's current leading technology, which will generate $400M USD in revenue in the next 4 years. 

•	Researched market opportunities aiming new verticals to diversify Honeywell’s portfolio.
•	Synthesized and applied functional business knowledge to determine business’ value proposition and revenue streams.
•	Established Honeywell’s key activities within the new business and determined new customer relationships.
profile_positions.title: External Business Consultant

company.name: Eagle Star Petróleo e Mineração - DuSolo

profile_positions.company: Eagle Star Petróleo e Mineração - DuSolo
profile_positions.description:
Implemented a new dynamic sampling method to ensure production of reliable phosphate sold to agri-business customers as a 18% P2O5 direct-application natural fertilizer (DANF). 

•	Established an exploration program which resulted an increase of company’s ore reserves by 10%.
•	Led exploration team of 4 geologists investigating and mapping over 10 phosphate targets.
•	Analyzed geochemical data and assessed low interest sites to be discarded, saving more than 5,000 USD in annual legal permits.
profile_positions.title: Exploration Coordinator - Geologist

profile_positions.description:
Analyzed geochemical and geological data in order to program an one-year drilling campaign focused on increasing company’s ore reserve (Iodine) in 10%.

•	Identified more than ten copper occurrences in prospective sites and presented accurate geology-based maps, cross sections, and geological models in GIS 3D environment.
•	Performed geostatistics and worked with consultants to develop figures & tables for NI 43-101 reports.
•	Designed and managed a RC drilling plan with 7,000 drill holes and two on-site drilling teams of 6, working in shifts 340 days for one year, thereby achieving the proposed deadline.
profile_positions.title: Full Exploration Geologist

profile_positions.description:
Diagnosed ore occurrences and formulated exploration techniques, enabling a 100,000 USD project and supporting the identification of a great Brazilian deposit (DM1 Mine: 1.2 mT lead/zinc).
	
•	Mapped over ten Base Metal targets and collaborated in an exploration team to evaluate potential areas for bigger research investments.
•	Interpreted diamond drill core samples and geophysical data to calculate grade distributions and ore limits.
profile_positions.title: Exploration Geologist
